title: Cosmic Blade Master Yi slices through the stars

replies.body: COSMIC BLADE ICON is perfectly matched for my name! Hallelujah.

Dear Riot, can you please make it so when you pick a champion the client loads all previous masteries, runes and maybe even summoners?
Also a way to group and arrange your champions so I could ie group my AP mids, ADC's and Junglers etc.
This would help with those that need to change a role quickly or champions and save dodges.
Any word on when Illaoi is getting a new skin?
Next skins are Dark Star Kha'Zix and Orianna
saw the new khazix skin, I'm glad they havent forgotten about him but also at the same time the skin isn't that appealing (at least for me)
Look at the leak this confirms it there are no heimer or teemo skins [](https://gyazo.com/8786210c82937ad84d4f43333bac2667)
still waiting on a pantheon update lol
Who needs a pantheon update when you can just build him ap :D
where ma boi voli skins at?? {{champion:106}}

you know what we need more then anything else.... {{champion:420}} an illaoi skin.. she only has 1. cmon riot srsly
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
can we have a volibear or urgot or fiddlesticks skin those guys need some love
urgot should be up next for a complete rework with all new visuals
I wonder if Yorick is going to get a skin in the next 10 years
Finally they made a new skin for {{champion:11}} me being a {{champion:11}} main I am really excited
